Bash(python3 -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''src'')
from orchestral.api.auth import hash_password, verify_password

# Test password hashing and verification
test_password = ''TestPassword123!''
hashed = hash_password(test_password)
print(f''Password: {test_password}'')
print(f''Hashed: {hashed}'')
print(f''Verification result: {verify_password(test_password, hashed)}'')
print(f''Wrong password check: {verify_password(""wrongpass"", hashed)}'')
")

Bash(python3 -c "
import json
import os

db_path = ''/tmp/orchestral_db.json''
if os.path.exists(db_path):
    with open(db_path, ''r'') as f:
        data = json.load(f)
    print(''Number of users:'', len(data.get(''users'', {})))
    for user_id, user in data.get(''users'', {}).items():
        print(f""User: {user.get(''email'')} - Has password_hash: {''password_hash'' in user}"")
else:
    print(''Database file does not exist'')
")
